section.title: Retain instance during configuration changes
section.para: You can use fragments without user interface and retain them between configuration changes via a call to their setRetainInstance() method.
This way your Thread or AsyncTask is retained during configuration changes. This allows you to perform background processing without explicitly considering the lifecycle of your activity .

section.title: Headless fragments
section.para: If you perform background processing you can dynamically attached a headless fragment to your application and call setRetainInstance() to true. This fragment is retained during configuration changes and you can perform asynchronous processing in it.
